text: Iceman is a fictional superhero from the Marvel Comics universe. He is a member of the mutant team, the X-Men. His real name is Bobby Drake. Iceman has the power to freeze anything around him. He can also turn his body into ice. Category:Characters created by Stan Lee Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1963 Category:Fictional characters with ice or cold abilities Category:Fictional gay men Category:X-Men characters Category:Marvel vs. Capcom fighters
title: Iceman (Marvel Comics)
